attributes.action: Object to the insult of 25 p a week increase in pension when aged 80
attributes.additional_details: I am so angry it's almost unbelievable that they have the ordacity to send a letter which costs more to post out than the 4 weekly amount.
attributes.background: To increase the aged 80 pension from the disgraceful insulting amount  of 25 pence a week  to bring in line with inflation after no increase since Ted Heath was pm it's an insult to every pensioner in this country !!!

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. We're not sure whether you'd like the Age Addition to be increased with inflation from now on, or for a one-off increase to meet inflation since it was introduced. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
